'''0.2.3''' is a server version of [[Java Edition Alpha]] released with client version [[Java Edition Alpha v1.2.1|v1.2.1]] on November 5, 2010.<ref name="blogpost">[[wordofnotch:1486843146|"Minecraft Alpha 1.2.1, Minecraft Server 0.2.3"]] – [[The Word of Notch]], November 5, 2010</ref>

== Changes ==
* Reverted mob spawning back to the old code.

== Fixes ==
* Fixed the player getting stuck in the top of the world in multiplayer.
